mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_food_elem.select */ SELECT food_no /* food_no 식품_번호 numeric */ ,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,nutr_qty /* nutr_qty 영양소_용량 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_food_elem WHERE 1 = 1 AND food_no = #{foodNo} /* food_no 식품_번호 numeric */ AND nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_food_elem.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_food_elem ( food_no /* food_no 식품_번호 numeric */ ,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,nutr_qty /* nutr_qty 영양소_용량 numeric */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */
,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */
,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{foodNo} /* food_no 식품_번호 numeric */ #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,#{nutrQty} /* nutr_qty 영양소_용량 numeric */
,#{regDt} /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */
,#{regTm} /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,#{uptDt} /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */
,#{uptTm} /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_food_elem.update */ UPDATE ti_food_elem
,nutr_qty = #{nutrQty} /* nutr_qty 영양소_용량 numeric */
,reg_dt = #{regDt} /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */
,reg_tm = #{regTm} /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id = #{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = #{uptDt} /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */
,upt_tm = #{uptTm} /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND food_no = #{foodNo} /* food_no 식품_번호 numeric */ AND nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
